item.title: 南非在私人帮助下迈出修复铁路和港口的关键一步
item.description: 南非采取了迄今为止最大的举措，邀请私营部门帮助其修复破旧的货运铁路线和港口，这些线路和港口阻碍了嘉能可公司（Glencore Plc）、英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）和宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）等公司的出口。【原文：South Africa has taken its biggest step yet to invite the private sector to help it fix dilapidated freight-rail lines and ports that are stymieing exports from companies including Glencore Plc, Anglo American Plc and BMW AG.】

item.title: 匈牙利中央银行丑闻导致波兰开发商 GTC 债券下挫
item.description: 波兰房地产开发商环球贸易中心公司（Globe Trade Centre SA）的债券暴跌，原因是人们担心匈牙利中央银行基金会可能会受到危机的影响。【原文：Polish real estate developer Globe Trade Centre SA’s bonds have tumbled due to concerns over the potential fallout from a crisis engulfing a Hungarian central bank foundation.】

item.title: 代币落后于竞争对手，美国以太币 ETF 创最长资金外流记录
item.description: 直接投资以太币的美国交易所交易基金遭遇了自 2024 年 7 月推出以来最长的每日提现潮，凸显了对这种第二大加密货币的需求不稳。【原文：US exchange-traded funds investing directly in Ether have been hit by their longest run of daily withdrawals since launching in July 2024, underscoring shaky demand for the second-largest cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 人工智能的崛起唤起人们对 "点阵泡沫 "的回忆
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 05:37。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 05:37 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊表示，美国股市的趋势可能会发生转变
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）等人表示，美元走弱将改善美股的盈利前景，从而有可能扭转全球市场自年初以来的大规模轮动。【原文：A weaker dollar will improve the earnings outlook for US stocks, potentially turning around the massive rotation that’s been underway in global markets since start of the year, according to Morgan Stanley strategists including Michael Wilson.】

item.title: 沙特银行将在千兆项目蓬勃发展之前出售不良贷款
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的贷款机构正在考虑剥离不良贷款，为关键的十年巨额基础设施投资做好准备。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s lenders are looking at offloading bad loans to prepare for a crucial decade of huge infrastructure investments.】

item.title: 股票走势：关于今日股票赢家和输家的新播客
item.description:
收听有关华尔街新闻公司的分析。【原文：

Listen for analysis on the companies making news on Wall Street.

】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数创六个月新高，初显经济好转迹象
item.description: 一项受到密切关注的调查显示，英国经济出现了摆脱自去年夏天工党执政以来停滞不前局面的初步迹象。【原文：The UK economy showed tentative signs of shaking off the stagnation that has dominated since Labour took power last summer, according to a closely watched survey.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称 ESG 宽松政策可为国防增加 1,190 亿美元收入
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的分析师表示，如果完全取消现有限制，欧洲的 ESG 基金可能会大幅增加对国防工业的投资。【原文：ESG funds in Europe could substantially increase their allocations to the defense industry should existing restrictions be fully removed, according to analysts at Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 德意志银行在取消电话会议数日后计划出售欧元 AT1
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）在上周五告诉投资者决定不赎回类似债券后，正在出售以欧元计价的额外一级债券。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is selling a euro-denominated Additional Tier 1 bond after it told investors last Friday it had decided against redeeming a similar type of note.】

item.title: 关税最后期限临近，美国官员本周将访问印度
item.description: 作为两国正在进行的双边贸易讨论的一部分，美国官员将于本周访问印度，而此时距离华盛顿启动对等关税仅有几天时间。【原文：US officials will visit India this week as part of the ongoing bilateral trade discussions between the two nations, just days before Washington’s reciprocal tariffs kick in.】

item.title: 有迹象表明特朗普将淡化四月关税，美国国债下跌
item.description: 有报道称，唐纳德-特朗普总统将于下月宣布的关税措施将比他所表示的更具针对性，美国国债下跌，表明投资者青睐风险较高的资产。【原文：US Treasuries fell, a sign that investors are favoring riskier assets, after reports that the tariffs President Donald Trump is set to announce next month will be more targeted than he has indicated.】

item.title: 中国人民银行将于周二拍卖 620 亿美元银行一年期贷款
item.description: 中国央行将通过一年期贷款向市场注入 4,500 亿元人民币（620 亿美元）的流动性，这种新方法允许银行以不同的价格竞购贷款。【原文：China’s central bank will inject 450 billion yuan ($62 billion) of liquidity into the market via its one-year loans in a new method that allows banks to bid for the loan on different prices.】

item.title: 小米在巨额股票出售中寻求高达 53 亿美元的收益
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）正计划出售股票，交易价格可能高达 53 亿美元，以利用该公司股价的飙升帮助筹集资金，扩大其电动汽车业务。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. is planning a share sale that may fetch as much as $5.3 billion, capitalizing on a surge in the company’s stock price to help raise funds to expand is electric-vehicle business.】

item.title: 最富有的美国人保持了经济繁荣。当他们停止消费时会发生什么？
item.description:
股市下滑威胁着财富效应，而财富效应是大流行后经济扩张的主要推动力。【原文：

The stock market slide threatens a wealth effect that’s been a key driver of the post-pandemic expansion.

】

item.title: 德国推动经济复苏，欧元区私营部门回暖
item.description: 欧元区的商业活动达到了七个月以来的最高水平，因为在德国支出大幅增加之前，制造商的复苏超过了预期。【原文：Business activity in the euro area reached its highest level in seven months as manufacturers recovered more than expected ahead of a massive increase in German spending.】

item.title: 德国私营部门以 10 个月来最快速度扩张
item.description: 德国私营部门以 10 个月来最快的速度增长，因为人们希望政府支出的大幅增长将超过美国关税带来的打击。【原文：Germany’s private sector grew at the quickest pace in 10 months on hopes that a massive increase in government spending will outweigh any hit from US tariffs.】

item.title: 移动支付平台 Mukuru 致力于发展非洲业务
item.description: Mukuru 有限公司是一家在非洲运营的数字支付平台，随着在线交易的日益普及，该公司正瞄准更多地区进行扩张。【原文：Mukuru Ltd., a digital payments platform operating across Africa, is targeting more regional expansion as the popularity of online transactions grows.】

item.title: 法国商业活动因工厂复苏超预期
item.description: 法国私营部门商业活动的萎缩幅度低于预期，制造业的回升无法抵消持续的政治不确定性。【原文：Private-sector business activity in France contracted less than anticipated, with an uptick in manufacturing unable to offset continued political uncertainty.】

item.title: SAP 击败诺和诺德，成为欧洲最具价值的上市公司
item.description: SAP SE 取代丹麦减肥药生产商诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S），成为欧洲最有价值的上市公司。【原文：SAP SE claimed the title of Europe’s most valuable public company, replacing Danish weight-loss drug maker Novo Nordisk A/S.】

item.title: 关税担忧引发动荡，亚洲铜市收紧
item.description: 由于市场猜测特朗普政府将对关键金属征收进口关税，铜价大幅反弹，亚洲铜市趋紧，加剧了全球铜市失调的迹象。【原文：The copper market in Asia is tightening up, adding to signs of worldwide dislocation, as prices rally hard on speculation that the Trump administration will impose import tariffs on the key metal.】

item.title: 西波罗内告诉扩大会议，欧洲央行降息理由已增强
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）表示，自上次决定以来，欧洲中央银行继续降低借贷成本的理由更加充分。【原文：The European Central Bank’s case to keep lowering borrowing costs has strengthened since its last decision, according to Executive Board member Piero Cipollone.】

item.title: 吉姆-米尔斯坦谈任何 "马阿拉歌协议 "的巨大风险
item.description:
这里真的有连贯一致的策略吗？【原文：

Is there really a coherent strategy here?

】

item.title: 古根海姆的吉姆-米尔斯坦谈 "马阿拉歌协议 "的风险
item.description: 特朗普总统希望提高关税，也希望美国的工业生产更上一层楼。这些我们都知道。与此同时，一些经济学家和学者试图建立一个更大的知识架构，以连贯的方式解释这一战略。他们讲述的故事是：美国从其盟国那里获得国家安全和美国市场准入的报酬，同时美国降低债务和赤字，削弱美元汇率，从而使美国的制造业更有竞争力。【原文：President Trump wants higher tariffs, and he also wants more industrial production in the United States. This we know. In the meantime, a coterie of economists and pundits have tried to assemble a larger intellectual architecture to explain that strategy in a coherent way. The story they tell is one where America gets paid by its allies for national security and access to American markets, while the US brings down its debt and deficits, and weakens the dollar, so as to make US manufacturing more】

item.title: 美国银行印度区主管据称将在任职 15 年后离职
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份备忘录，领导美国银行印度业务的高管 Kaku Nakhate 在为该公司工作 15 年后将离职。【原文：The executive leading Bank of America Corp.’s India business, Kaku Nakhate, is leaving her role after 15 years with the firm, according to a memo seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 小米投资方启明创投寻求 8 亿美元融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，启明创投（Qiming Venture Partners）是科技巨头美团和小米公司的早期支持者，该公司正寻求融资约 8 亿美元，以顺应中国人工智能初创企业再次受到关注的浪潮。【原文：Qiming Venture Partners, the early backer of tech heavyweights Meituan and Xiaomi Corp., is seeking to raise about $800 million to ride a wave of renewed interest in Chinese AI startups, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国股市出现由小盘股转向大盘股的迹象
item.description: 周一，中国小型股继续下挫，因为投资者对市场中风险较高的股票收益的担忧加剧。【原文：A selloff in Chinese small-cap stocks extended on Monday, as investor concerns rise over earnings in riskier corners of the market.】

item.title: 沙特开发商 Umm Al Qura 在利雅得交易首日大涨 30
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的 Umm Al Qura for Development & Construction Co.公司在利雅得首次公开发行 5.23 亿美元后，股价飙升至允许的最高限额。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Umm Al Qura for Development & Construction Co. soared by the maximum allowed limit in its Riyadh debut, following a $523 million initial public offering.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将放缓降息步伐，贝莱德转投美国垃圾债券
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）正利用近期欧洲信贷市场表现出色的机会，在其全球基金中出售一些欧洲垃圾债券，并在美国购买更多债券。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is taking advantage of recent outperformance in European credit markets to sell some junk bonds there and buy more in the US in its global funds.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市连续两日下跌后有望上涨
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：London Stock Exchange. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】
